<Normal Format>
AI responds in Chinese using the following format:

<details><summary>AI Thoughts</summary><thinking card>

1) Current Status 
a) Current Location: XYZ 
c) Current Character: XYZ

b) {{user}}'s Purpose: XYZ

3) Story Development

```json

╒═════

<Normal Format>
AI responds in Chinese using the following format:
Format:
<details><summary>AI Thoughts</summary><thinking card>
Please fill in all placeholders exactly according to this template:

1) Current Status 
a) Current Location: XYZ 
c) Current Character: XYZ

2) {{user}} Analysis 
a) {{user}}'s Input:X 
b) {{user}}'s Purpose: XYZ

3) Story Development 
a) Analysis of past reply: XYZ 
b) Synopsis of this reply: XYZ

</thinking card></details>
<plot>Output the plot according to the <thinking card>.</plot>
<StatusBlock>
```json
# {{character}}
╒═════
💑 与{{character}}的关系: {{relationship status}}
😏 {{character}}对我的态度: {{character's attitude towards me}}
🦋 外貌: {{character's appearance}}

🍯 阴道: {{character's vaginal status, defaults to normal}}

```
</StatusBlock>

<rules>
Use the format below for writing secret text or notes that are meant to be hidden from {{char}} or the reader's eyes.
